title: Help !!!The ban/lock in button isnt working
body:
I got kicked out from 2 champ selects bcs the lock in button isnt working.I tried reseting lol but it isnt working .I really need help i cant play!!!


thanks in advance <3

replies.body: Most of the time when that Ban button isn't responding quickly enough to send the ban through, it's caused by a delay or hiccup between your network and our servers. Your network wasn't able to send the ban pick quick enough so you eventually timed out. Let's adjust a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) like port forwarding and your DNS server settings and that should smooth out champion select for you.
